dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Vincent, I heard that today is our last day of classes at school, and then they want us to study at home. Can we resume our online study sessions?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Of course, Yvonne. I also think studying together is more effective.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: What about your mom... Won't she mind?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: My grades were really good in the last test, and my mom was pleased with them.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: She even apologized to me for the misunderstandings she had before. I think she now understands the importance of us studying together.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: That's great! I really feel I learn better when I study with you.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Oh, Yvonne, I’d like to continue studying with you, but I feel I need some time for personal revision. I want to focus on strengthening my weak areas before the exam.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: I understand. Indeed, everyone has their own study plan and needs before exams.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Right, but I’m still grateful for the time we studied together. Good luck with your exams!

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Thank you, Vincent. Let's both do our best!
